subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms}}
Probably cognate with {{och-l|倚}} ({{zh-ref|Wang, 1982}}). Perhaps {{och-l|因}} is an [[allofam]] ({{zh-ref|Pulleyblank, 1991}}), though the vowels do not agree ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[lean on]]
# to [[rely on]]; to [[depend]] on
# to [[obey]]
